summary: The Safeguarding Our Levees Act (H.R. 2774) amends the Flood Control Act of 1941 to establish a 180-day deadline for the Secretary to initiate the repair or restoration of flood control projects after receiving a request from a non-Federal sponsor. The bill also amends subsection (d)(2). The bill aims to expedite the response to flood damage and ensure timely repairs to critical infrastructure.
